nodes.text: Sibba Loto was a wealthy male Ortolan merchant who was killed during the invasion of Ziost in 3636 BBY during the Galactic War.

Sibba Loto appears in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan. He was to be involved in a Ziost daily mission "Wrongful Owners", involving him asking players to retrieve stolen merchandise from the Death's Claw pirates near the wreckage of the Opsrey's Veil; however, the mission was cut and only Loto's corpse appears in-game.
